changeSet.author: shiva (generated)
changeSet.createView: select uuid() as id, u.id as user_id,u.first_name,u.last_name,u.login,cqpm.qc_level,cqpm.project_id,ucm.id as user_customer_mapping_id,cqpm.status,p.customer_id from user u, user_customer_mapping ucm, customer_qc_project_mapping cqpm,project p where ucm.user_id=u.id and cqpm.user_customer_mapping_id=ucm.id and cqpm.project_id=p.id union select uuid() as id,u.id as user_id,u.first_name,u.last_name,u.login,pqlc.qc_level,pqlc.project_id,ucm.id as user_customer_mapping_id, 0 as status,p.customer_id from project p, project_qc_level_configurations pqlc,user_customer_mapping ucm,user_authority_mapping uam,user u, customer c where pqlc.project_id=p.id and ucm.user_id=u.id and uam.user_id=u.id and uam.authority_id=6 and p.customer_id=c.id and ucm.customer_id=c.id and concat(p.id,pqlc.qc_level,ucm.id,u.id) not in ( select concat(cqpm.project_id,cqpm.qc_level,ucm.id,u.id) from user u, user_customer_mapping ucm, customer_qc_project_mapping cqpm where ucm.user_id=u.id and cqpm.user_customer_mapping_id=ucm.id )
